songs.title: Suga Mama
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Camila]
Boy, you know that I want it, I can tell you want me as your lady
Can't deny that you're sexy, so what's it gon' be?

[Pre-Chorus 1: Normani]
Is you gon' get a job and make some of that green?
You tryna take me out but you can't pay for me
I guess I got the cash, I'll take one for the team
Baby, can't you see?

[Interlude: Lauren]
Oh, oh, I won't ask you to go

[Chorus: Normani & All]
But I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, baby
I can't be your suga mama, I said, I said
I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, mm mm
I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, baby
I can't be your suga mama and even though I love the thought of you
No, I can't be your, I can't be your

[Post-Chorus: All & Camila]
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama, su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Mmm yeah

[Verse 2: Ally]
Hey, I love what you do to me, ain't nobody love me like, like you do
I won't call you lazy, but how you pay for food?

[Pre-Chorus 2: Dinah]
My daddy said "No," you ain't no good for me
Not balling in that dough but I'm paying for your things
Something's gotta change, boy, hmm please (boy, please)
Oh, baby, can't you see?

[Interlude: Lauren]
Oh, oh, I won't ask you to go

[Chorus: Normani & All]
But I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, baby
I can't be your suga mama, I said, I said
I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, mm mm
I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, baby
I can't be your suga mama and even though I love the thought of you
No, I can't be your, I can't be your

[Post-Chorus: All & Camila]
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama, su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Mmm yeah

[Bridge: Normani & Normani & Dinah & (Normani, Dinah & Lauren)]
Ain't got that money, money, ain't got a damn thang
Wish you could be my honey, you make me sang, sang
Ain't got that money, money, ain't got a damn thang
(What you want me to say ooh)

[Chorus: Normani & All]
But I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, baby
I can't be your suga mama, I said, I said
I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, mm mm
I can't be your suga mama, your suga mama, baby
I can't be your suga mama and even though I love the thought of you
No, I can't be your, I can't be your

[Post-Chorus: All]
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama, su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama, su-, su-, su-, your suga mama
Su-, su-, su-, your suga mama

[Outro: Camila]
Oh I can't be your suga mama...
